post.author: 관리자
post.content:
April 11, 2002



Steven Kim

Computer Science Korean Association





Dear COSKA members:



I am pleased to invite you to participate in our workshop on Friday April 19, 2002 from 2:00-4:00p.m. at 339 Bloor St. West 2nd Floor (Recreation Room).



The Korean Canadian Women뭩 Association has been organizing a series of anti racism campaign since 1999.   Each year, we set a separate issue which dealt with the most concern to the Korean community.   Employment Equity is a theme in this year.  



What we will discuss at the workshop is following: how the principle of employment equity applies to us, what is the employment inequity, and what can we do when we are discriminated in employment process.   Also, there will be a time to discuss with our guest speakers about any concerns that you are interested in.  



I hope we as one of visible minority groups can make our voice to other communities.  Thank you for your cooperation.





Yours truly,





Eunsim Su

Project Coordinator

Korean Canadian Womens Association
post.title: Invitation from KCWA (Yeo Sung Hye)
